Instance.description: Defines special d-maps that should be applied to sims only when the sim has CasParts of a specific gender applied

Tunable.name: ActiveIfSimDoesntHaveBreasts
Tunable.description: Defines whether this tuning is applied for sims that don't have breasts

Tunable.name: ActiveIfSimHasBreasts
Tunable.description: Defines whether this tuning is applied for sims that have breasts

Tunable.name: ConditionalCasPartBodyType
Tunable.description: This tuning applies only to sims wearing a CASPart of this BodyType and Gender

TunableEnum.name: ConditionalCasPartGender
TunableEnum.description: This tuning applies only to sims wearing a CASPart of this BodyType and Gender

Tunable.name: FallbackDmapName
Tunable.description: Dmap name. If specified, this dmap will be applied if none of the modifiers in the list above are present on the sim
Tunable.group: Dmap Applied If No Mapped Modifiers Present On Sim

Tunable.name: FallbackDmapValue
Tunable.description: The value at which the fallback dmap will be applied, if there is a fallback dmap specified. Use 0 if no fallback dmap
Tunable.group: Dmap Applied If No Mapped Modifiers Present On Sim

Tunable.name: MaxValueMapping
Tunable.description: When the modifier specified is present at 1, the dmap specified will be applied at this value

Tunable.name: MinValueMapping
Tunable.description: When the modifier specified is present at near 0, the dmap specified will be applied at this value

TunableEnum.name: OccultType
TunableEnum.description: The occult type this tuning is specific to.
